code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import SearchForm from'./SearchForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const apiKey='9126235c52a94e60a45193fc6fb0df64';const apiURL='https://api.spoonacular.com/recipes';function App(){const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);const handleSearchByIngredients=async ingredients=>{const endpoint="/findByIngredients";const urlToFetch=apiURL+endpoint;const params={ingredients,number:5,apiKey};const response=await axios.get(urlToFetch,{params});if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Data cannot be fetch, sorry");}setRecipes(response.data);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"What's in your firdge?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchForm,{onSearch:handleSearchByIngredients})]});};}export default App;
